Post._content:
Hexo Markdown Hexo Mac Hexo Next ### npm ``` $ brew install npm ``` npm Hexo ``` $ npm install -g hexo-cli ``` -g Hexo cmd ``` $ hexo init ``` hexo Web ``` $ hexo server ``` Web webpack-dev-serverWeb 4000 localhost:4000 [![tvZgrF.jpg](https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/06/13/tvZgrF.jpg)](https://imgchr.com/i/tvZgrF)
Hexo
- 4000 -p / --port Web hexo s -p 8000 - hexo hexo -s / --static hexo ### Next Next Hexo themes _config.yml theme ``` $ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next.git themes/next ``` theme next > _config.yml ``` theme: next ``` ![tvQYJH.jpg](https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/06/13/tvQYJH.jpg)
Hexo next
``` hexo clean ``` Next Muse scheme > themes\next\_config.yml ``` # Schemes scheme: Muse #scheme: Mist #scheme: Pisces #scheme: Gemini ``` ### #### 1. > _config.yml ``` title: Yearito's Blog # description: Stay hungry, stay foolish. # language: zh-CN # author: yearito # ``` #### 2. > themes\next\_config.yml ``` footer: # since: 2018 # icon: name: heart # animated: true # color: "#ff0000" # powered: enable: true # Hexo version: false # Hexo theme: enable: true # version: false # ``` #### 3. > themes\next\_config.yml ``` toc: number: false # ```

Hexo Markdown Hexo Mac Hexo Next ### npm ``` $ brew install npm ``` npm Hexo ``` $ npm install -g hexo-cli ``` -g Hexo cmd ``` $ hexo init ``` hexo Web ``` $ hexo server ``` Web webpack-dev-serverWeb 4000 localhost:4000 [![tvZgrF.jpg](https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/06/13/tvZgrF.jpg)](https://imgchr.com/i/tvZgrF)
Hexo
- 4000 -p / --port Web hexo s -p 8000 - hexo hexo -s / --static hexo ### Next Next Hexo themes _config.yml theme ``` $ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next.git themes/next ``` theme next > _config.yml ``` theme: next ``` ![tvQYJH.jpg](https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/06/13/tvQYJH.jpg)
Hexo next
``` hexo clean ``` Next Muse scheme > themes\next\_config.yml ``` # Schemes scheme: Muse #scheme: Mist #scheme: Pisces #scheme: Gemini ``` ### #### 1. > _config.yml ``` title: Yearito's Blog # description: Stay hungry, stay foolish. # language: zh-CN # author: yearito # ``` #### 2. > themes\next\_config.yml ``` footer: # since: 2018 # icon: name: heart # animated: true # color: "#ff0000" # powered: enable: true # Hexo version: false # Hexo theme: enable: true # version: false # ``` #### 3. > themes\next\_config.yml ``` toc: number: false # ```

Post.title: Hexo
Post._content: ### ``` $ hexo new [layout] ``` <!-- more --> layout post source\_posts\ Markdown #### Hexo post page draft scaffolds default_layout #### post post source\_posts\ #### page page Next menu > themes\next\_config.yml ``` menu: home: / || home about: /about/ || user + tags: /tags/ || tags + categories: /categories/ || th + archives: /archives/ || archive ``` #### draft draft source\_drafts\ ``` $ hexo publish <title> ``` source\_drafts\
Post.raw:
--- title: Hexo date: 2020-06-13 18:47:56 tags: - Hexo ---

### ``` $ hexo new [layout] ``` <!-- more --> layout post source\_posts\ Markdown #### Hexo post page draft scaffolds default_layout #### post post source\_posts\ #### page page Next menu > themes\next\_config.yml ``` menu: home: / || home about: /about/ || user + tags: /tags/ || tags + categories: /categories/ || th + archives: /archives/ || archive ``` #### draft draft source\_drafts\ ``` $ hexo publish <title> ``` source\_drafts\

Post.title: Hexo
Post._content:
#### Google Fonts > themes\next\_config.yml ``` font: enable: true # //fonts.googleapis.com () host: # body global: external: true family: Monda # (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6) headings: external: true family: Roboto Slab # posts: external: true family: # Logo logo: external: true family: # code codes: external: true family: ``` #### ##### # # > themes\next\layout\_macro\post.swig ```
{% if post.tags and post.tags.length and not is_index %}
{% for tag in post.tags %} - # {{ tag.name }} + {{ tag.name }} {% endfor %}
{% endif %} ...
``` ##### post-end-tag.swig > themes\next\layout\_macro\post-end-tag.swig ```
{% if not is_index %}
-------- --------
{% endif %}
``` > themes\next\layout\_macro\post ``` {#####################} {### END POST BODY ###} {#####################} + {% if config.post_end_tag.enabled and not is_index %} +
+ {% include 'post-end-tag.swig' %} +
+ {% endif %} {% if theme.wechat_subscriber.enabled and not is_index %}
{% include 'wechat-subscriber.swig' %}
{% endif %} ``` > _config.yml ``` post_end_tag: enabled: true # icon: paw # ``` #### ``` $ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-pace themes/next/source/lib/pace ``` pace: true #### Next theme-next-canvas-nest ``` $ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-canvas-nest themes/next/source/lib/canvas-nest ``` canvas_nest: true Next v6.5.0 > themes\next\_config.yml ``` canvas_nest: enable: true onmobile: true # color: '0,0,255' # RGB opacity: 0.5 # zIndex: -1 # z-index count: 99 # ``` #### ``` $ npm install --save hexo-helper-live2d ``` > _config.yml ``` # Live2D # https://github.com/EYHN/hexo-helper-live2d live2d: enable: true pluginRootPath: live2dw/ pluginJsPath: lib/ pluginModelPath: assets/ Relative) # scriptFrom: local # # scriptFrom: jsdelivr # jsdelivr CDN # scriptFrom: unpkg # unpkg CDN # scriptFrom: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/live2d-widget@3.x/lib/L2Dwidget.min.js # tagMode: false # {{ live2d() }} / log: false # # model: use: live2d-widget-model-shizuku # npm package # use: wanko # /live2d_models/ # use: ./wives/wanko # # use: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/live2d-widget-model-wanko@1.0.5/assets/wanko.model.json # display: position: left # width: 100 # height: 180 # mobile: show: false react: opacityDefault: 0.7 # ``` [hexo live2d](https://huaji8.top/post/live2d-plugin-2.0/) live2d-widget-models . shizuku ``` $ npm install live2d-widget-model-shizuku ``` live2d.tagMode: true ``` {{ live2d() }} ``` live2d Header > themes\next\layout\_partials\header\index.swig ``` + {% if is_index %} + {{ live2d() }} + {% endif %} ``` #### back-to-top CSS3 source\images\ [](http://yearito.cn/images/scroll.png) > themes\next\source\css\ _custom\custom.styl ``` // .back-to-top { right: 60px; width: 70px; // height: 900px; // top: -900px; bottom: unset; transition: all .5s ease-in-out; background: url("/images/scroll.png"); // > i { display: none; } &.back-to-top-on { bottom: unset; top: 100vh < (900px + 200px) ? calc( 100vh - 900px - 200px ) : 0px; } } ``` #### themes\next\source\js\cursor\ [](https://script-1256884783.file.myqcloud.com/cursor/fireworks.js) > themes\next\layout\_custom\custom.swig ``` {# #} {% if theme.cursor_effect == "fireworks" %} {% elseif theme.cursor_effect == "explosion" %} {% elseif theme.cursor_effect == "love" %} {% elseif theme.cursor_effect == "text" %} {% endif %} ``` custom.swig body ``` themes\next\layout\_layout.swig ... {% include '_third-party/exturl.swig' %} {% include '_third-party/bookmark.swig' %} {% include '_third-party/copy-code.swig' %} + {% include '_custom/custom.swig' %} ``` > themes\next\_config.yml ``` # mouse click effect: fireworks | explosion | love | text cursor_effect: fireworks ```

--- title: Hexo date: 2020-06-20 15:42:16 tags: - Hexo ---

#### Google Fonts > themes\next\_config.yml ``` font: enable: true # //fonts.googleapis.com () host: # body global: external: true family: Monda # (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6) headings: external: true family: Roboto Slab # posts: external: true family: # Logo logo: external: true family: # code codes: external: true family: ``` #### ##### # # > themes\next\layout\_macro\post.swig ```
{% if post.tags and post.tags.length and not is_index %}
{% for tag in post.tags %} - # {{ tag.name }} + {{ tag.name }} {% endfor %}
{% endif %} ...
``` ##### post-end-tag.swig > themes\next\layout\_macro\post-end-tag.swig ```
{% if not is_index %}
-------- --------
{% endif %}
``` > themes\next\layout\_macro\post ``` {#####################} {### END POST BODY ###} {#####################} + {% if config.post_end_tag.enabled and not is_index %} +
+ {% include 'post-end-tag.swig' %} +
+ {% endif %} {% if theme.wechat_subscriber.enabled and not is_index %}
{% include 'wechat-subscriber.swig' %}
{% endif %} ``` > _config.yml ``` post_end_tag: enabled: true # icon: paw # ``` #### ``` $ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-pace themes/next/source/lib/pace ``` pace: true #### Next theme-next-canvas-nest ``` $ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-canvas-nest themes/next/source/lib/canvas-nest ``` canvas_nest: true Next v6.5.0 > themes\next\_config.yml ``` canvas_nest: enable: true onmobile: true # color: '0,0,255' # RGB opacity: 0.5 # zIndex: -1 # z-index count: 99 # ``` #### ``` $ npm install --save hexo-helper-live2d ``` > _config.yml ``` # Live2D # https://github.com/EYHN/hexo-helper-live2d live2d: enable: true pluginRootPath: live2dw/ pluginJsPath: lib/ pluginModelPath: assets/ Relative) # scriptFrom: local # # scriptFrom: jsdelivr # jsdelivr CDN # scriptFrom: unpkg # unpkg CDN # scriptFrom: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/live2d-widget@3.x/lib/L2Dwidget.min.js # tagMode: false # {{ live2d() }} / log: false # # model: use: live2d-widget-model-shizuku # npm package # use: wanko # /live2d_models/ # use: ./wives/wanko # # use: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/live2d-widget-model-wanko@1.0.5/assets/wanko.model.json # display: position: left # width: 100 # height: 180 # mobile: show: false react: opacityDefault: 0.7 # ``` [hexo live2d](https://huaji8.top/post/live2d-plugin-2.0/) live2d-widget-models . shizuku ``` $ npm install live2d-widget-model-shizuku ``` live2d.tagMode: true ``` {{ live2d() }} ``` live2d Header > themes\next\layout\_partials\header\index.swig ``` + {% if is_index %} + {{ live2d() }} + {% endif %} ``` #### back-to-top CSS3 source\images\ [](http://yearito.cn/images/scroll.png) > themes\next\source\css\ _custom\custom.styl ``` // .back-to-top { right: 60px; width: 70px; // height: 900px; // top: -900px; bottom: unset; transition: all .5s ease-in-out; background: url("/images/scroll.png"); // > i { display: none; } &.back-to-top-on { bottom: unset; top: 100vh < (900px + 200px) ? calc( 100vh - 900px - 200px ) : 0px; } } ``` #### themes\next\source\js\cursor\ [](https://script-1256884783.file.myqcloud.com/cursor/fireworks.js) > themes\next\layout\_custom\custom.swig ``` {# #} {% if theme.cursor_effect == "fireworks" %} {% elseif theme.cursor_effect == "explosion" %} {% elseif theme.cursor_effect == "love" %} {% elseif theme.cursor_effect == "text" %} {% endif %} ``` custom.swig body ``` themes\next\layout\_layout.swig ... {% include '_third-party/exturl.swig' %} {% include '_third-party/bookmark.swig' %} {% include '_third-party/copy-code.swig' %} + {% include '_custom/custom.swig' %} ``` > themes\next\_config.yml ``` # mouse click effect: fireworks | explosion | love | text cursor_effect: fireworks ```
